questions.question: Will you ever post to my blog? Can you?
questions.answer: We can post to your blog. However, we will never post to your blog.

questions.question: What information does the counter take from my account?
questions.answer: The only information we store is your username (Tumblr URL without ".tumblr.com") and your follower count. More Info.

questions.question: Who can see my follower counter?
questions.answer: As of now, your counter is publicly available. There is no way to make your counter private.

questions.question: Are we required to place the code on our blogs?
questions.answer: Nope! The code is for your own enjoyment.
